reviewText:
Many think of the 49ers as the team of the 80's, but forget that the second most successful team of that era were the Washington Redskins under legendary coach Joe Gibbs.  In a town that so many love to bash and with so much that needed to be done, the Washington Redskins of this time brought a since of unity and joy that was sorely needed then and is still needed today.

Hail to the REDSKINS
